title: how do i change the board to miscellaneous its not there D:
body: i just wanted to post my how to play league without a mouse easily guide and theres no miscellaneous board to choose plz help.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
You can find the miscellaneous boards [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), though you may or may not meet the level requirement for posting there. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
